metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10712 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
In PHP before 5.5.32, 5.6.x before 5.6.18, and 7.x before 7.0.3, all of thereturn values of stream_get_meta_data can be controlled if the input can becontrolled (e.g., during file uploads). For example, a "$uri =stream_get_meta_data(fopen($file, "r"))['uri']" call mishandles the casewhere $file is data:text/plain;uri=eviluri, -- in other words, metadata canbe set by an attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10712` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
php7.0 - 7.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.25-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
